message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd be a great fit for it!  I'm asking for $14,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the opportunity, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still a bit higher than your offer.  Let's compromise at $13,000.  This is a great price for you and I'm confident we can work this out!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counteroffer at $12,500. This is my maximum budget for this purchase.
